00044 typedef struct {
00045         uint32_t timeStamp;
00046         uint16_t dateStamp;
00047 
00048         uint16_t millisec;
00049         uint16_t second;
00050         uint16_t minute;
00051         uint16_t hour;
00052         uint16_t day;
00053         uint16_t month;
00054         uint16_t year;
00055         
00056 } JausTime_t;
00057 
00058 
00059 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_SIZE_BYTES              JAUS_UNSIGNED_INTEGER_SIZE_BYTES // size
00060 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_SIZE_BYTES              JAUS_UNSIGNED_SHORT_SIZE_BYTES // size
00061 
00062 // Bit Shift Defines
00063 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_MILLISEC_SHIFT  0
00064 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_SECOND_SHIFT    10
00065 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_MINUTE_SHIFT    16
00066 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_HOUR_SHIFT              22
00067 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_DAY_SHIFT               27
00068 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_DAY_SHIFT               0
00069 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_MONTH_SHIFT     5
00070 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_YEAR_SHIFT              9
00071 
00072 // Bit Mask Defines
00073 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_MILLISEC_MASK   0x1FF   // 9 bits
00074 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_SECOND_MASK     0x3F    // 6 bits
00075 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_MINUTE_MASK     0x3F    // 6 bits
00076 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_HOUR_MASK               0x1F    // 5 bits
00077 #define JAUS_TIME_STAMP_DAY_MASK                0x1F    // 5 bits
00078 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_DAY_MASK                0x1F    // 5 bits
00079 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_MONTH_MASK              0x0F    // 4 bits
00080 #define JAUS_DATE_STAMP_YEAR_MASK               0x7F    // 7 bits
